::::_verifyDutHALSteady { args }

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- proc _verifyDutHALSteady A proc that sends a cli to a broadcom switch and will not return until HAL is in sync Args In: -dut Out: return 1 when completed Typical usage: if {_verifyHALSteady -dut $nDUT} { proceed with test } { else, connectionTimeout will pop an error } ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

::::_verifyTestBedHALSteady { }

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- proc _verifyTestBedHALSteady Using MultiTask proc, connect to all DUTs in a test bed and make sure that HAL is in sync for all DUTs before continuing Typical usage: _verifyTestBedHALSteady -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
